cause.description:
As our nation's only libertarian public interest law firm, we pursue cutting-edge litigation in the courts of law and in the court of public opinion on behalf of individuals whose most basic rights are denied by the government--like the right to earn an honest living, private property rights, and the right to free speech, especially in the areas of commercial and Internet speech.
Official website: www.ij.org
Facebook group: http://flagler.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2266649212
1. Economic Liberty
2. School Choice
3. Private Property Rights
4. Freedom of Speech
5. Individual Liberty
cause.mission: The Institute for Justice advances a rule of law under which individuals can control their destinies as free and responsible members of society.
